text: The 'Shadow Syndicate' is reportedly planning an attack in Nairobi.
Clashes were reported between two rival gangs in the Kibera slum.
Authorities seized a cache of weapons from a warehouse in Mombasa.
The group 'Al-Shabaab' has claimed responsibility for the incident.
Police are investigating a series of robberies in the city of Kisumu.
A meeting is scheduled between President Ruto and opposition leaders.
The Eastleigh neighborhood has been placed on high alert.
Interpol has issued a warning about a new phishing scam.
The attack was carried out by a lone wolf operative.
Several arrests were made in connection with the recent bombing in Garissa.
